snippet: President-elect Donald Trump and his team on Wednesday vigorously rejected charges of turmoil and infighting roiling efforts to set up his White House, national security and economic teams. A week after his upset victory, Trump said the enormous e...
lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump and his team on Wednesday vigorously rejected charges of turmoil and infighting roiling efforts to set up his White House, national security and economic teams. A week after his upset victory, Trump said the enormous endeavor was proceeding "so smoothly."

headline.main: Trump: No Transition Turmoil, Efforts Going 'So Smoothly'
headline.print_headline: Trump: No Transition Turmoil, Efforts Going 'So Smoothly'
